verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seals, <S%G4973><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures <S%G2226><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Thunder, <S%G1027><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See. <S%G991><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Horse <S%G2462><s%> White, <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Bow; <S%G5115><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Crown, <S%G4735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Overcoming <S%G3528><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Overcome. <S%G3528><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Living Creature <S%G2226><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See. <S%G991><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Horse <S%G2462><s%> Red; <S%G4450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Him <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> To Take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> They Should Slay; <S%G4969><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Sword <S%G3162><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Living Creature <S%G2226><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See. <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Horse <S%G2462><s%> Black, <S%G3189><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Balance <S%G2218><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures, <S%G2226><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> A Choenix <S%G5518><s%> Of Wheat <S%G4621><s%> For A Denarius, <S%G1220><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Choenixes <S%G5518><s%> Of Barley <S%G2915><s%> For A Denarius : <S%G1220><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Oil <S%G1637><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Thou Mayest Not Injure. <S%G91><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fourth, <S%G5067><s%> I Heard The <S%G191><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fourth <S%G5067><s%> Living Creature <S%G2226><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See. <S%G991><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Horse <S%G2462><s%> Pale, <S%G5515><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1883><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> His Was <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> Follows <S%G190><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> To Kill <S%G615><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fourth <S%G5067><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Sword <S%G4501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Famine <S%G3042><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beasts <S%G2342><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fifth <S%G3991><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Under <S%G5270><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar <S%G2379><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Souls <S%G5590><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Having Been Slain <S%G4969><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony <S%G3141><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Held; <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Crying <S%G2896><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> When, <S%G4219><s%> O 3588 T-NSM Master, 1203 N-NSM The 3588 T-NSM Holy 40 A-NSM And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM, True, 228 A-NSM 3756 PRT-N Dost Thou Not Judge 2919 V-PAI-2S And 2532 CONJ Avenge 1556 V-PAI-2S 3588 T-ASN 129 N-ASN Our Blood 2257 P-1GP On 575 PREP Those Who 3588 T-GPM Dwell 2730 V-PAP-GPM On 1909 PREP The 3588 T-GSF ; Earth? 1093 N-GSF

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Given <S%G1325><s%> To Each <S%G1538><s%> Robes <S%G4749><s%>, White; <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Said <S%G4483><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Should Rest <S%G373><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> A Time <S%G5550><s%> Little, <S%G3398><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> Shall Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4889><s%> Their Fellow Bondmen <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Their Brethren, <S%G846><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Be Killed <S%G615><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sixth, <S%G1623><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Earthquake <S%G4578><s%> A Great <S%G3173><s%> There Was, <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Black <S%G3189><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> Hair, <S%G5155><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Moon <S%G4582><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Fig Tree <S%G4808><s%> Casts <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3653><s%> Its Untimely Figs, <S%G846><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> A Great <S%G3173><s%> Wind <S%G417><s%> Being Shaken. <S%G4579><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Departed <S%G673><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Book <S%G975><s%> Being Rolled Up, <S%G1507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Island <S%G3520><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5117><s%> Their Places <S%G846><s%> Were Moved. <S%G2795><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3175><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rich, <S%G4145><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Captains, <S%G5506><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Powerful, <S%G1415><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Free Man <S%G1658><s%> Hid <S%G2928><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Caves <S%G4693><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rocks <S%G4073><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Mountains; <S%G3735><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Mountains <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Rocks, <S%G4073><s%> Fall <S%G4098><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hide <S%G2928><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne, <S%G2362><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb; <S%G721><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%>, Of His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Stand? <S%G2476><s%>
